content.text:
# Nariman, Republic of Dagestan

}}
Nariman (; , Mahmut) is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative centre of Koktyubinsky Selsoviet, Nogaysky District, Republic of Dagestan, Russia. Population:  There are 102 streets.
Geography
Nariman is located 5 km northwest of Terekli-Mekteb (the district's administrative centre) by road. Terekli-Mekteb and Kalininaul are the nearest rural localities.
Nationalities
Nogais live there.
References
